evidence.text:
Person A: It’s a “he”. Um... His Christian name is unlisted.  I just hope this goes well. I know it’s not a competition, but I haven’t baptized a single investigator on my mission yet.
Person B: Good afternoon, ma’am. My name is Sister Barnes. And this is my companion, Sister Paxton.
Person A: Are you interested in learning more about our savior Jesus Christ? The mom doesn’t say a word, just keeps walking.
Person A: Oh my gosh, they’re so pretty. I already love these girls.

Person A: Text from Sister Hall. She says we’re not supposed to be meeting this guy.
Person A: Maybe he’s outside the stake boundaries. Let me ask.
Person B: My mother was a convert. So when my dad passed away, we auditioned a few different churches, just to see what’s out there, make sure we still believed it.
Person B: And now that you’ve been studying The Book of Mormon, how does it make you feel?

Person A: We won’t know if we’re comfortable until you ask. So maybe just ask?
Person B: If you don’t ask the question, I’m going to leave here wondering what we missed out on.

Person A: I know it may be difficult to imagine, but Polygamy was a spiritual mission needed at that time, in order to grow the ranks of our membership in the wake of much hardship and bloodshed. A man having plural wives meant more babies to help the community grow.
Person A: -- it was removed from the church not because it was “grotesque” or “controversial”, but because it was no longer necessary.

Person B: -- what’s Carl’s Jr?
Person A: Checkers. Burger King is better than Hardees which is better than Checkers which is better than Wendy’s which is better than In & Out which is better than McDonalds which is better than Jack in the Box which is better than nothing.

Person A: right, okay, right, i don’t want to spook him, but let’s wrap this
Person A: nothing, let’s just politely wrap this and head back

Person B: stuck, what? unlock it?
Person B: he still there?
Person A: no i heard him leave
Person A: maybe we ask him for help?
Person B: Maybe if you unlock it, it will open?
Person B: We walked up a hill, but I thought it plateaued in the back?
Person A: Are you asking us... for us to deliberate our belief in the church?

Person A: Are you coming too?
Person B: It’s okay. One step at a time. We’ll go slow.
Person B: Let’s have a code word. Uh, if I say “Magic Underwear”. It means you stab.
Person B: But not until he opens the front door.
Person A: Start a fire. Smoke out the speaking pipe in the basement. Make sure the Elder know we’re here.
Person B: Sister, that’s not how I remember it, come on! Help!  Hold the sleeve up. I’ll get it started.

Person A: Okay.
Person B: Focus.
Person A: Sorry.
Person B: Come on come on...
Person A: Try it faster.
Person B: Who rang the doorbell?
Person A: I saw it. She was dead. She was dead, Sister. We checked. There was a corpse. Did you see it too?
Person A: And I heard her... I heard her describe what she experienced on the other side.
